entities.name: xenophilius

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A guest at Xenophilius' house, who has managed to balance the tea tray on a side table.

entities.name: gurdyroots

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Xenophilius' daughter, who is down beyond Bottom Bridge and has caught Plumpies to make soup.

entities.description: A location where Luna is currently at.

entities.name: plumpies
entities.description: The type of animal that Luna has caught to make soup.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: A guest at Xenophilius' house, who is asking about the symbol on Xenophilius' neck.

entities.name: bill and fleur's wedding
entities.description: The event where Xenophilius was wearing a symbol around his neck.

entities.name: deathly hallows
entities.description: The symbol that Harry and Hermione are asking about.

relationships.description: Xenophilius is offering Harry and Hermione an infusion of Gurdyroots.
Luna has caught Plumpies to make soup.
Harry is asking Xenophilius about the symbol on his neck, which is the Deathly Hallows.
Xenophilius was wearing a symbol around his neck at Bill and Fleur's wedding, which is the Deathly Hallows.
